detectors.description:
name() should be declared external:

symbol() should be declared external:

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnVault.sol#151-159)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnVault.sol#161-169)

increaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.increaseAllowance(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BurnVault.sol#188-199)

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
